ch0091_20_shirona/0101_0701_02_10:
Care to join me on a little excursion around
the island?
ch0091_20_shirona/7101_0701_01_10:
In myths, there are many accounts of Pokémon
interacting with the rest of the world.
ch0091_20_shirona/7101_0701_02_10:
Thus, learning about these myths allows you to
learn more about different facets of world history.
ch0091_20_shirona/7101_0701_03_10:
If you’re interested in that, I’d be happy to explain
more about it.
ch0091_20_shirona/7102_0701_01_10:
Giratina lives in a world that exists on the
reverse side of ours.
ch0091_20_shirona/7102_0701_02_10:
It’s a mysterious world, one that’s both near and
far from ours at the same time.
ch0091_20_shirona/7102_0701_03_10:
For us, it’s unreachable...but also closer than we
may think.
ch0091_20_shirona/7103_0701_01_10: This outfit’s design is based on Giratina.
ch0091_20_shirona/7103_0701_02_10:
And just like Giratina, who watches over us from
the world on the other side of ours...
ch0091_20_shirona/7103_0701_03_10:
I hope to look deeper into the other sides of the
myths I research as well.
ch0091_20_shirona/7104_0701_01_10:
It’s difficult to decipher a clear message from
a wall mural in the same way you do when
reading written text.
ch0091_20_shirona/7104_0701_02_10:
But these murals have a strong impact on those
who see them, and they evoke thoughts and
feelings in a way words can’t express.
ch0091_20_shirona/7105_0701_01_10:
When I see that sparkle in your eyes, it reminds
me of a Trainer I know.
ch0091_20_shirona/7105_0701_02_10:
That Trainer and I met Giratina together. I still
remember it vividly to this day.
ch0091_20_shirona/1701_0701_02_10:
I found something nice and thought you might
want to have it.
ch0091_20_shirona/1701_0702_01_10: I hope you find that present useful.
ch0091_20_shirona/2501_0701_01_10:
Have you ever thought that it’d be nice to
meet a character from a story in real life?
ch0091_20_shirona/2501_0701_02_10:
I’ve always dreamed of meeting the Pokémon
depicted in Sinnoh’s myths.
ch0091_20_shirona/2501_0701_03_10:
And now I’ve become a sync pair with Giratina.
I never imagined it would actually happen.
ch0091_20_shirona/2501_0702_01_10:
As long as you keep on dreaming, eventually,
wishes do come true.
ch0091_20_shirona/2501_0702_02_10:
That applies to you, too. You should pursue and
focus on the things you love.
ch0091_20_shirona/2511_0701_01_10:
There are Trainers who harbor so much hate for
this world that they’re plotting to recreate it.
ch0091_20_shirona/2511_0701_03_10:
The history of our world was built by everyone
working together, hand in hand.
ch0091_20_shirona/2511_0702_01_10:
When you meet wonderful people and Pokémon,
I think your heart also changes for the better.
ch0091_20_shirona/2511_0702_02_10:
If everyone’s heart starts to change for the better,
I believe the world will become a better
place, too.
ch0091_20_shirona/3001_0701_01_10:
The sunrise before a big journey, the dawn of
a new adventure... Mornings can rouse all sorts
of emotions within us.
ch0091_20_shirona/3003_0701_01_10:
Did you know that the ruins they created on Pasio
are based on real ruins found in other regions?
ch0091_20_shirona/3005_0701_01_10:
I can tell by the look on your face that you and
your partner conquered another hurdle today,
didn’t you.
